Unnamed Package

  • Class
    Description
    AlreadyInUseCoordinates
    Exception thrown when coordinates provided are already in use.
    AssignInputPosition
    The AssignInputPosition class is responsible for assigning positions of ships and grenades on the game board for both the player and the computer.
    Battleship
    Main class for the Battleship game.
    CheckCoordinates
    Provides functionality to check if given coordinates for ships and grenades are already used or outside the game grid.
    ComputerInput
    Generates computer inputs for ship and grenade positions in the Battleship game.
    GameEngine
    The GameEngine class manages the gameplay logic for the Battleship game.
    OutsideTheGridCoordinates
    Exception thrown when coordinates provided are outside the permissible game grid.
    PlayerInput
    Handles the player's input for positioning ships and grenades on the game board.
    Position
    Represents a position on the Battleship game board.
